channel.title: Stupidity on Butterfly Dream
channel.description: Recent content in Stupidity on Butterfly Dream

item.title: On India's Mission to Mars
item.description: Our neighbours over in India have a plan to launch a space mission to Mars. The Mangalyaan probe was to have been launched as early as 28 October, but rough weather in the Pacific forced officials to delay the launch by a week. The unmanned mission has a launch window lasting until 19 November. Meanwhile in Pakistan we still concern ourselves with useless issues like what our Northern province should be called?
